context: Analyze this standing pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Triangle Pose (Trikonasana) Standing side bend with straight legs and hand to floor. Consider the Hamstring flexibility, lateral spinal extension, balance. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Standing side bend with straight legs and hand to floor
practitioner.primaryFocus: Hamstring flexibility, lateral spinal extension, balance

specificNeeds: Hamstring flexibility, lateral spinal extension, balance
